entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Dorion
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:29 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 20. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
